message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1,200,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm definitely interested in the product, but I was hoping for something a bit lower. Would you consider $1,000,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than $1,000,000 to make it worth my while. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1,150,000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  To be totally transparent, I have a budget I need to stick to. Would you be willing to come down to $1,075,000?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your transparency about your budget. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1,125,000. This is my best offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
